```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
ggplot(data=univoltine_butterfly,
       aes(forewing_length, rain_jun))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(colour=sex))+
  ggtitle ("The length of male and female butterly wings during the rain in June")+
  labs(y = "forewing_length", x = "rain_jun")
```

##R markdown
This plot shows that the length of male and female wings in June is realtivley similar to each other shown by box plot graph displayed 

```{r univolutine_butterfly}
view(univoltine_butterfly)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=univoltine_butterfly, aes(year))+
  geom_density(aes(colour=sex))+ xlab("sex")
+ ggtitle("The year male and female butterflies were born")+
  scale_colour_manual(values=c"#0000FF", "#E69F00")
```
